int CIMDUtil::calcCS (  char *  message,
int  length
)  [inline, static]
 

Calculate the CIMD checksum.

Parameters:
message The message to be checksummed. Space (2 chars )for the checksum should be included before the last <etx>.
length The length of the message.

int CIMDUtil::convertFromSpecialCombi (  char *  outBuffer,
char *  inBuffer,
int  inBufferLen
)  [static]
 

Converts the combi-coded message in inBuffer to a GSM-coded message in outBuffer.

The length of the decoded message can be shorter than the encoded.

Parameters:
outBuffer The buffer to put the result into.
inBuffer The buffer to read from
inBufferLen The length of inbuffer.
Returns:
The length of the data in outBuffer.

Definition at line 178 of file CIMDUtil.h.

int CIMDUtil::combiMapSize [static, private]
 

Size of the combimap.

Set with initCombiMap in .cpp-file. It is to be considered as a dummy variable, because the main purpose of it is to make sure that initCombiMap is run.

Definition at line 190 of file CIMDUtil.h.

Map used when converting UCS2 encoded 16-bit data to iso.

Definition at line 183 of file CIMDUtil.h.

int CIMDUtil::ucs2MapSize [static, private]
 

Size of the map containing the translation from UCS2 to ISO.

Its value is calculated by initUCS2Map in the .cpp file.
